origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'AgricultureAPI.analyze_data', 'description': 'This function analyzes the agricultural data and its impact on the real estate project based on the provided report data and project impact data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportData', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The agricultural data in JSON format.'}, {'name': 'projectImpact', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The impact of the project on agriculture in JSON format.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of the agricultural data impact on the project.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 AgricultureAPI.analyze_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportData'是'{"cropYield": 500, "soilQuality": "high", "waterUsage": 1000}', 'projectImpact'是'{"landUse": 200, "waterConsumption": 500}'.
